results.snippet: EDWARDS AIR FORCE BASE, Calif., Dec. 8 (AP)-- Air Force Maj. Robert H. Lawrence Jr., the first Negro United States astronaut, was killed today when his F-104 crashed on the runway during a training flight, the Air Force announced.
